o( de\ *dionu/sios eu)labhqei/s, mh/ tines tw=n stratiwtw=n a)potolmh/swsin e)carpa/zein to\n *fu/twna, pausa/menos th=s timwri/as katepo/ntise to\n a)tuxh= meta\ th=s suggenei/as.

kaq' o(
 de\ kairo
 ma/lista *(rh/gion e)polio/rkei *dionu/sios, oi( katoikou=ntes ta\ pe/ran tw=n *)/alpewn *keltoi\ ta\ stena\ dielqo/ntes mega/lais duna/mesi katela/bonto th

tou/tous d' e)/nioi/ fasin a)po\ tw=n e)n *turrhni/a| dw/deka po/lewn a)poikisqh=nai: tine\s de/ fasi *pelasgou\s pro\ tw=n *trwikw=n e)k *qettali/as fugo/ntas to\n e)pi\ *deukali/wnos geno/menon kataklusmo\n e)n tou/tw| tw=| to/pw| katoikh=sai.

tw=n ou)=n *keltw=n kat' e)/qnh dielome/nwn th

 a)riqmo
 o)/ntes peri\ trismuri/ous, th

kaq' o(
 dh\ xro/non o( dh=mos o( tw=n *(rwmai/wn pre/sbeis a)pe/steilen ei)s *turrhni/an tou\s kataskeyome/nous th

 tw=n *keltw=n. parageno/menoi de\ oi( pre/sbeis ei)s *klou/sion kai\ qewrh/santes para/tacin genome/nhn, a)ndreio/teroi ma=llon h)\ fronimw/teroi genhqe/ntes pareta/canto toi=s *klousi/nois pro\s tou\s poliorkou=ntas.

eu)hmerh/santos de\ qate/rou tw=n presbeutw=n kai/ tina tw=n e)ndocote/rwn e)pa/rxwn a)poktei/nantos, gno/ntes oi( *keltoi\ to\ gegono\s ei)s *(rw/mhn pre/sbeis a)pe/steilan tou\s e)caith/sontas to
 presbeuth
 to
 a)di/kou pole/mou prokatarca/menon.

h( de\ gerousi/a to\ me
 prw=ton e)/peiqe tou\s presbeuta\s tw=n *keltw=n xrh/mata labei=n peri\ tw=n h)dikhme/nwn: w(s d' ou) prosei=xon, e)yhfi/santo paradou=nai to
 kathgorou/menon. o( de\ path tou= me/llontos paradi/dosqai, tw=n xilia/rxwn ei(=s w)
 tw=n th

 e)pi\ toi=s plh/qesin e)/peisen a)/kuron poih=sai th
 kri/sin th=s sugklh/tou.
o( me\n ou)=n dh=mos e)n toi=s e)/mprosqen xro/nois pa/nta peiqo/menos th=| gerousi/a|, to/te prw=ton h)/rcato dialu/ein to\ kriqe\n u(po\ th=s sugklh/tou.

oi( de\ tw=n *keltw=n pre/sbeis paragenhqe/ntes ei)s to\ sfe/teron strato/pedon a)ph/ggeilan th

 h)pei/gonto th

 to
